humbled by the confidence and support of those who believe we should pursue the presidency, but after much deliberation and prayer, we believe our calling is closer to home," Mr. Mike Pence wrote in the letter. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana. We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012. Police said the inquiry was being moved from the Metropolitan Police's counter-terrorism command and would now be led by a specialist crime unit.
